koohiiStory1: Animals use their urine to mark their territory. So for them, their body water works as a flag denoting their "country" (why bother? we all know which story you are going to pick).
koohiiStory2: Someone is pissing on the American flag, but since the urine is clear it looks like water.
words:
屎尿(しにょう): excreta, raw sewage, human waste, night soil
尿(にょう): urine
